params.functionSelector: The function selector of the function to be called.
params.r: The r component of the signature.
params.s: The s component of the signature.
params.salt: The salt used to generate the signature.
params.v: The v component of the signature.

authenticate(uint8,bytes32,bytes32,uint2.notice: Authenticates a user by verifying an EIP712 signature.
